tool_description: Verifies domain ownership through multiple methods including DNS validation, HTTP validation, and email validation for domain-validated certificates.

domain_name.description: Fully qualified domain name to verify ownership

verification_method.description: Verification method: DNS, HTTP, or EMAIL

validation_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for validation checks (60-3600)

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain name must be a valid FQDN format.
Unsupported verification method: Use DNS, HTTP, or EMAIL verification methods.
DNS validation failed: Could not find required DNS TXT record with challenge token.
HTTP validation failed: Could not retrieve challenge token from /.well-known/acme-challenge/ path.
Email validation failed: Domain owner did not respond to verification email within timeout period.
Domain not resolvable: Domain name does not resolve to any IP address.
Timeout exceeded: Validation process exceeded the specified timeout period.
usage: Provide domain_name and verification_method. For DNS/HTTP methods, challenge_token will be generated if not provided. Tool will attempt domain ownership verification using the specified method.

verification_status.description: Status of domain verification: VERIFIED, FAILED, or PENDING

verification_method_used.description: The actual verification method that was used

challenge_token.description: The challenge token used for verification

dns_records_found.description: DNS records found during verification process
